document_data.title: In Cold Blood
document_data.author: [[Chris Tulach]]
document_data.mainbody: '''In Cold Blood''' is an adventure module from the RPGA [[Legacy of the Green Regent]] campaign.
document_data.Plot:
A Waterdhavian noblewoman's servants have been turning up dead and she wants to know why, preferably without involving the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|Watch]].

{{quote|Winter is harsh and merciless in the North. All that is cruel and cold is embodied in Auril the Frostmaiden. She is devoid of compassion and her frozen heart knows nothing but cold hate. The wise fear her; while the foolish follow her.|[[Teseryne Truesilver]]}}
